data.title: Oregon State Capitol Foundation
data.meta_description: The Capitol Foundation Board shares your enthusiasm in preserving our Capitol, sharing its history and engaging Oregonians in our democracy.
data.text:
Judy Hall had a natural transition to serve on the Capitol Foundation because of her interest in preserving the history of the Capitol.
